member.name: M:SwashbuckleAspNetCoreRepro.Controllers.Api.V1.TestController.GetNonNested(System.Int32)
member.summary: This action captures the route parameter in a simple int, and does not throw a swagger error upon clicking the action to expand it.

member.summary: This method captures the route parameter in an int property within a nested class, and does throw a swagger error upon clicking the action to expand it.

summary.para: [ApiVersionNeutral] means that aspnet-api-versioning won't consider controllers derived from this class to be API controllers. Therefore, we don't have to set a default API version in Startup.cs.
[ApiExplorerSettings] means that we want to exclude these controllers and their children from Swagger.

member.name: T:SwashbuckleAspNetCoreRepro.Infrastructure.ConfigureSwaggerOptions
member.remarks: This allows API versioning to define a Swagger document per API version after the service has been resolved from the service container.

member.name: M:SwashbuckleAspNetCoreRepro.Infrastructure.ConfigureSwaggerOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to generate Swagger documents.

member.name: T:SwashbuckleAspNetCoreRepro.Infrastructure.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:SwashbuckleAspNetCoreRepro.Infrastructure.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
